content.detailedDescription: I was at home at night and walked out onto my deck with my dog and immediately saw a very bright light appearing stationary in the southeast sky in the direction of a small airport for personal aircraft approximately 1-2 miles away. i knew right away it was unusual so i knocked on the window to my fiancé to bring my camera(canon powershot sd700is). there were bare trees and rooftops in that direction for a reference and i noticed it drifted to the left a few feet gauging at arms length and then drifted to the right of its original position fairly quickly. about that time my fiancé came out with my camera and it banked left and headed southwest or to my right. there was no noise noticed up to that point and all of the sudden it sounded like a small aircraft with a single engine giving full throttle like it was climbing but it wasn't,just banking. i also saw seemingly typical flashing navigation lights at that time. i thought that whole event itself was kind of strange but convinced myself it was a small plane because of the engine noise,which you can hear in the video. so this morning 1/23/2016 i decided to look at the video on my computer for the first time and noticed the light on the left,which is the one i thought was the plane,doesn't really look like plane lights. but stranger than all of that was the light i never noticed when making the video. you see it to the right of the light i was filming and it started out very bright white and then dimmed to a star like light,appeared to jump a rather large distance instantly, and then rapidly shot down towards the ground at about a 45 degree angle and left the screen. several seconds later it appears to be moving parallel with the ground moving to the left on the screen at the bottom. this is my second sighting i have reported but have seen several things in the sky in the past year that i can't explain. i live near and in the flight path of louisville international airport. i was very excited when i first saw it,but then decided it was a plane but kept filming anyway. i lost sight of it because of dense trees.
content.summary: One craft either was a small plane or acted like one,the other light wasn't noticed at the time

content.detailedDescription: I was in north fork california at 4:18 p.M. on january 1st 2016. i was taking photographs of the sunset and sky as i normally do when i go up to that area. i didn't notice anything in particular in the sky since there were clouds... when i came home four hours later and enlarged the photographs and i noticed the object. it appeared from the photographs that it was moving from south to north possibly south east to north west. i didn't notice it at all at the time i took the photographs but only when i came home and enlarge them. i used a samsung galaxy 5 phone to take the pictures. i don't know what it is, it kept the same shape but the lights on it changed from the pictures, even seeming to turn into a blur in one of the pictures.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset, 4 hours later i decided to enlarge the photos and noticed the object.

content.detailedDescription:
In my backyard with a friend talking it was about 8 pm.
i was looking at the sky cause that's my thing i like looking at the sky cause you never know what you might see. i was looking se then i turned around to talk with my friend and as soon as i turned around something inside of me told me. to turn around so i did these bright like caught my eye then another one just showed up from no where.
very bright appeared and disappeared all of a sudden.
i felt the same.
had to go inside to go to sleep.
content.summary: Just a very bright color in the sky way to bright to be a star, plane, flare or etc and for it to appear out no where was the strange part.

content.detailedDescription:
starting about 20 years ago i have been taken repeatedly. the incidents all happened within 50 miles of lake minnewaska in west central mn. as far as i can tell it happens around once a month probably more. i have no memory of it after it happens. at first i wasn't sure what was going on.
 
   i began experiencing anxiety, fatigue, insomnia, periodic headaches, unexplained cuts, scars, rashes, and bruises. i began having strange confusing flashes of memory. at first they were just a terrifying jumble of fragmented images, sounds, and sensations. after a few years of thinking i was starting to crack up, they eventually started to come together and become more distinct, and orderly. at this point i have a pretty clear memory of what happened.

   it usually happens around 2am or so. if i'm asleep, i wake up in a panic, unable to move. all my hair stands on end, and i feel an odd sensation. almost like an electrical charge flowing through me. its very difficult to breath. a blinding light shines in through the windows and there are tall thin figures standing all around me. i start hearing there thoughts in my head. usually something like don't be afraid, or there will be less discomfort if you stop trying to resist. 
   
   i raze off my bed, and float outside, and raze up in to the light. here is were things vary a bit. some times they just do some kind of scan. other times they preform surgical procedures. i can remember having my head clamped in place, and needles or other instruments inserted in to my scull, ears or up my nose. other times in to my forearms, or abdomen. at some point i looses consciousness, and find myself back in my bed.

   i know there was at least once that they came when i was awake. it happened 3 years ago in mid september. i couldn't sleep so i was watching netflix on my computer. next thing i know i'm waking up the next morning. i remember thinking how odd it was that i didn't remember going to bed. i made my way down stares where i noticed the door was open. i found my rifle laying on the front step next to 3 ejected rounds. all 3 still intact, except that there primers had been struck. so far i have not regained the memory of what happened that night. 

   i'm not 100% sure this is related, but i just had to reshingle my roof. i only put the new asphalt shingles on about 3 yeas ago, and they already started curling up and crumbling. they appeared to be scorched.
content.summary: I have been taken repeatedly since my early teens, possibly earlier.

content.detailedDescription: Two separate crafts. both zigzagging then taking off in opposite directions. i observed this up to up to 6 different times
content.summary: Two separate crafts. both zigzagging then taking off in opposite directions. i observed this up to up to 6 different times

content.detailedDescription: It flew over lake fayettville when i was fishing then when we were leaving i saw a large plane like object then it started to move in impossible angles, and the object came down to about 30 ft to the ground.At first i was scared when it came to the ground.The object finally flew off into the distance.
content.summary: Triangular in shape but flat

content.detailedDescription:
Just a normal evening in my house where me, my husband and daughter reside.
i have sent pics to mufon before and received a call, but nothing more was ever discussed.
i dont want to go into too much detail as i feel whatever is happening is not good at all! i have turned from an avid enthusiast to someone who would like to remain anonymous!
i have more photos and videos. this is just the tip of the iceberg so to speak.
it has gone from outside to both inside and out.  very frightening!!!
content.summary: A regular nightly experience just different shapes

content.detailedDescription: I ride a bicycle and was literally 500ft from my house when i noticed a bright orange light in the sky. there were almost no clouds in the sky and the near-full moon was shining brightly not far from where i first noticed the object. it was almost circular or spherical but i had originally thought it was just appearing that way and was actually a plane on fire. there is a small airport near my home but this object was coming from and heading toward completely different direction(s). i was on my cell phone at the time and began freaking out, explaining what i was witnessing in great detail to the person i was speaking to. they live in the northern us so there was unfortunately no way the person could also witness the event. i thought about recording it immediately but because i was on the phone talking, while being in awe and amazed at what i was seeing, and also remembered what a few pictures i took of an orange moon looked like from my phone camera... horrible. therefore, i unfortunately did not take any pics or video. they would have just looked like a little orange speck in the sky, especially with the bright moon just a short distance away from what i was seeing. the object moved from left to right and, again, i thought it was a plane on fire and in danger. i saw what looked like flaming debris falling from the object. the first time i saw that, i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me. when it happened two more times, i realized i really was seeing something fall from the object. it would happen very quickly and was only visible for a split second as it fell and the flames would go out. once the flames went out from whatever was falling, i could not see where it fell after that since it had just finished getting dark out when this whole incident took place. the entire time i was freaking out on the phone and had a feeling inside that i was witnessing something strange and unexplained. after deciding that it might not be a plane, i thought it might be a meteor. it had no trail at all and was not really moving quickly either. i wasnt sure what to think, and still dont know. after only a few minutes, the object changed directions from its original path, to suddenly heading away from me. i could tell at that point the object was getting smaller, and what i thought to be fire was slowly fading away. eventually, before it was too far away to see, the orange glow was totally gone and i could only see a tiny speck just above the treeline. that shortly vanished as well and my experience was over. i absolutely regret not taking video or trying to take pictures and you can take my story for what it is worth. i will say that i am not a dishonest person and would never take the time out to join this site and make this report unless there was good reason. do i think it was aliens?? i have no idea. what i do think is that it was a ufo as far as i'm concerned. an unidentified flying object, and i will never forget what i saw. after the event, i ran into my house and immediately searched the internet for other people who may have seen it. i found the mufon site in the process and decided to make a report. i hope there are others out there who saw this object and have some good photos or video of it. i will be searching for quite some time for answers and other people who shared my experience. i'm not sure how high up it was because i'm not sure how big it actually was, but it was definitely in the sky so i know other people must have witnessed it and it should have been visible for a good distance all around. so, that's everything. i will never forget it and i await the day i see it again. this time, i will have my camera/phone ready and regardless of what i think it will look like once i get a shot of it, i'm going to try. hopefully, i will be able to add to the mystery at that point and maybe even find some answers. thanks for listening.
content.summary: Very clear skies, near full moon. object looked like plane on fire at first, saw what looked like flaming debris fall toward earth. was moving right to left, then sudden direction change, orange faded, object faded moving away from me at the end.

content.detailedDescription: Seen a series of lights in a row i was grilling on the back deck seen a series of lights in a row we do have a training base close but not for air craft for land base troops it was a row of lights no sound but went back out to deck to get my phone i heard gun fire but i have training fields around me i ask my 10 year old to look she see the same thing i did may have been flares but we never seen flares in 8 years we lived here
content.summary: Stacked

content.detailedDescription: 4 of us swam out at wasaga beach till we couldnt touch bottom this cloud came outta no where and this water spout came right at us goin west to east when then eye hit us their it was plain as day a triangle ufo sucking up the water were just hoovering their we didnt even have to tread the water as were watching big water drops floating up then it just vanished in a blink of an eye our buddies mom at the shore was freakin out cause she thought we were goners we ask her what did she c and all she said was a water spout we asked her if that was all she seen and she said yeah so we made a vow never to talk about it
content.summary: Dark metalic but parts of it shined  3 bright circles at each point

content.detailedDescription: Walked out side to my work truck looked up at some birds on a electric pole when it caught my eye in the sky far of in the distance . it was very high altitude about the size of my thumb nail wide cigar shape moving across the sky on a clear morning. what made me take anough look was there was not any vapor trail on it like the jet that had been by earler and later that day. it was to high in the sky to be a prop airplane it was also a cold day most jets leave a vapor trail on cold days i watched it along with a co worked trying to figure out what it might be. we looked at each other and when we looked back up it was gone behind some high building because we were standing in the down town part of our city  we talked to each other as to what it could be it was not a blimp because it was so high up in the sky realy dont know what it might be
content.summary: Cigar shape moving at a high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was just looking at the sky at school.
2. i saw a light flicker quickly in the sky.
3. a shooting star
4. light moving in a circular path. a light patch. like an orbit.
5. obvious i was scared.
6. it just disappeared.
content.summary: A light hovering in the  sky in a circular path in a very quick manner. partly cloudy and some clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: I have had experiences with aliens, usually the "grey" aliens mostly they are 2 foot or smaller, some times taller. the first real one i remember clearly as having the beings. i was 11 years old and lived in lorain, ohio. i was laying in bed to go to sleep, when i see a holographic image of a lion walking in place in my bedroom. then i see my windows covered in probably 30 small aliens, all standing side by side and marching in sync. the next memory that i have, im waking up in the morning and i remember a naked blong haired and blue eyes boy being above me. i had physical manifestation of discharge for some days after this. ive had many other experiences through out my life. including implants and helicopters going over my home during the experiences. i am interested in finding some one to do hynotic regression, if thats what its called. i would also love to find some one who does research on implants. though i am not interested in having them removed. thank you.
content.summary: This latest one was an out of body experience, bright light sound and seeing two apparitions. when these happen it is often that a helicopter with a search light will be going over head a few times afterwards.

content.detailedDescription:
It was an unusual night with fog on the river, warm weather when it should be cold and/or snowing. the fog stayed close to the ground reaching a few stories in the air at most. i went to town to buy something and made my purchase right after they called "shoppers, you have 10 minutes..." so i know it was about that approximate time when i arrived home.

i drove the rural way home along the river. i live very close to the river. when i was getting very close to home, i noticed a cluster of 3 orange lights very close to me over neighbor a's yard across the road from me or right on the river; that's how close we are to the river.

i live in a rural area so the neighbors' houses are a few hundred feet from each other.

this cluster of orange lights was about helicopter height. there was no structure to support the lights or i could not see the structure even though it was above the fog. the lights beamed a little. they looked exactly like the street lights on my road with the same color, same size, and same slight beam of light except that i was looking at a cluster of 3 lights. the orange lights stayed stationery as i drove down my road and into my drive way.

i had never seen orange lights this low in the sky and there was no structure present as to why the lights would be there.

i parked the car in the back of the house and ran to a front corner of the house to see if the cluster of lights were still there. it was but it started slowly moving in a straight line, moving closer to me.

i ran the short distance to get my sister to come outside and look at "this big plane". there is frequent unusual activity in the sky here so she put on shoes and came running out.

what i witnessed before she got outside was a giant black triangle shape reveal itself over neighbor b's house which is the 2nd house from me to the west.  the triangle went in a straight line over neighbor b's house, it backed up a little bit like it changed it's mind and then traveled in straight line directly at me.

it had descended to top-of-tree height by now. was it going to crash? why is it so low? what is it? i was scared and wanted to run somewhere but where to? i was in the middle of the yard and if i ran in the house and it crashed, that was not a great place to go. if it was looking for me, it had already spotted me.

my sister arrived outside and looked up to see it just as it started to travel in a straight line from neighbor b's house.

it had great height to it. it was not a flat triangle. it was several stories height. it was flat black or dark gray color. it was way larger than a football field. it was enormous. it was so close, detail was clear of it's structure, size and lights.

it turned on it's bottom lights on it's way over to my yard. it had varied bottom lights. outlining the craft were small white lights with 3 sets of red/green lights. in the middle was a large triangle area of what looked like white led lights glowing. the pattern of these white lights was indescribable.  was it showing clouds or transparency?

as the triangle front endpoint arrived at the yard, it started emitting this hydraulic engine type of noise, loud, roaring, and bumpy sounding. i'm familiar with hydraulic engine sounds as to the many boats on the river here and that's the closest i would describe it. 

(i had heard that same loud engine noise travel the entire sky a few weeks prior to this event from inside my house. i ran outside to sight what would make that loud noise and i could not see it.)

it scared me so i didn't look when it was directly overhead but my sister watched it. i could still see it even when not looking directly at it. the white lights glowed. i looked up at it after several seconds, and it was still there, hovering/moving very slowly. 

i got a good look at the bottom lights at this time but still don't know how to describe the white lights in the middle, what pattern the white lights were. maybe it was a transparent area as well as being lit up.

if she hadn't come outside when she did, i was on my way to hiding. instead, she came outside and yelled at it to get out of here. the noise was loud enough that i couldn't hear her yelling at it. i felt responsible for calling her outside to see it and i didn't want it to get her so i stayed while making useless getaway plans and getaway movements.

she seen it approach but she didn't realize how close it was because of night depth perception issues. i wouldn't have yelled at it but she did and i'm glad. i hope that's what made it go away.

we watched it until the end of the triangle shape went over us. it turned off it's sound and lights after it went over us. the black triangle disappeared into the black night and we didn't stand around outside after that. when the sky is heavy with water like that, you can't see the stars, it's just very dark.

we still marvel over seeing this triangle. we talk about it every day. i'm nervous when i have to frequently walk back and forth between the 2 houses on the lot here. you don't want to see it again but you want to. such a mixture of feelings, it was a major event for me.

it would be nice and way easier to believe that it is human military but i don't know if that is plausible. now we joke about how it was a good thing she came outside before it vacuumed me up and that two of us was too many for it to beam up. i nervously laugh.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Stationary orange lights reveal to be a giant triangle that glide directly over us.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo disguised as a shed landed, the tall lanky figure with black crusty headgear approached me at night after exiting his shed-like space craft. he took me into his space-shed, there was a tear stained mattress like space bed floating above the floor, the alien said his name was phd. he prodded me in all my holes with his probing device until it discharged its used battery acid all over my bottom after i woke up all sticky in my bedroom with my pet dog chip dead next to me, phd doesn't like dogs.

i hope you can help me track down phd so i can thank him for a wonderful night!
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Insignia, Appendage(s), Louvres, Wings
content.summary: Spooky

content.detailedDescription: My mothers boyfriend was taking me to work that night, we were about 5 minutes from work when i noticed something up the road. from afar it looked like an airplane, but the lights were to bright. as we got closer to the craft we come to find out it wasn't moving at all. we pulled over to look at it and the only thing we could see were two bright lights and a cigar shaped craft, no noise was coming from it. as another car passed by it started to ascend into the clouds. i was struck in awe, i had goosebumps all over and was shaking, i could not believe what i have just seen.
content.summary: Craft was hovering in mid air, asended into clouds, no sounds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-5 just south of stockton ca. about 7pm, i witnessed 6 bright orange orbs directly in front of me that were in the shape of a diamond. they illuminated a steady reddish orange glow.  i thought they may be several helicopters at first. the formation abruptly changed pattern as 4 of the orbs formed a semi-circle to the upper right of the formation and 2 fell down and to the left in a straight line above and parallel to the horizon.  the formation flew directly over me, and judging by the speed and cloud cover backdrop they appeared to be small and close to the ground.  i wished i could pull over to see if i could hear anything. being former marine, i had not seen any aircraft that had running lights such as these.  there were no flashing strobes or other type of standard running lights that i could see. i was able to see the objects in my mirrors as i continued to drive and lost sight of them after a short time.
content.summary: 6 orange orbs in diamond formation - abruptly changed formation- small and steady in lumination

content.detailedDescription: I didn't witness the event. see the news on facebook, approximately an hour after it happens. i start to look for it on google, found a video on youtube, and the local newspapers began to report pictures and videos from people on instagram and twitter. there are five balls emitting an intense blue light, it happen between 8 and 9 pm, moving in the sky, one not far away from each other and changing their pattern of flight, sometimes is a v pattern, then an m pattern. i don't know what happened at the end of the event, if they landed or disappeared, i don't know. there are many witnesses, apparently.
content.summary: Five blue shining balls moving in changing pattern in the center of bogota city

content.detailedDescription:
Years ago, somewhere during the winters of 2005-2007 i saw a red orb hovering erratically in my neighbors yard across the street from my parent's house. if i had to place the time of day, i would say somewhere between 9pm-10pm. i was wearing headphones listening to music at the time, but i had this instinctual feeling to take them off and that's when i heard an electronic buzzing/humming noise, similar to a transformer in a power substation. this noise was coming from my next door neighbor's backyard which is in the opposite direction from where i saw the orb.

at this moment, i noticed movement from across the street and when i looked over i saw a red orb hovering around the neighbor's yard i mentioned earlier. it hovered at about the height of a large dog would stand, however it moved extremely quick and was incredibly agile. it appeared to change direction with ease and turned on a dime, as if it were on an axis. i observed it hovering and racing around for maybe 3-5 minutes when it raced towards the northern edge of my neighbors yard and turned west headed down a walking path that runs through my parent's neighborhood. 

it should be noted, my brother saw something very similar the summer before i witnessed it only it was floating in between my parent's house and the other next door neighbor's house. it was also seen by my dad close to the edge of the backyard of the neighbor who lives behind them. my dad's sighting however was much more recent, august 2012.
content.summary: Hovering orb in neighbors yard, buzzing noise heard before sighting.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were traveling west on hwy 82 in estill county. i was talking on my cell phone to my mother and noticed a bright light dropping down from the sky. i hung up on my mother to get my daughter to video but my phone wouldn't respond. i watched it drop right before my eyes. it was triangle in shape with a light beam going straight down. it has flashing red, green and yellow light. all of a sudden it darted off to the left and dropped behind a hill. i do not remember driving for about 1 hour and 52 minutes of 35 miles. i remember talking to my aunt and as i was talking to her a bright light came inside my car from above. i looked up and saw the object again. it was right above my car. it was a dull gun metal gray in color had something round in the center. i couldn't tell what shape it was this time. it was so close. there was no sound what so ever. mt daughter is 11 and had on a pink hoodie which appeared to be bright neon orange at the time the light was shining through the sunroof of my car. it barely came in view of my windshield and my daughter was tryin to get a video as it darted off to the right. we could still see it but it was not showing up on the video on the phone. after it went out of sight my hair was so wet from sweat and both my daughter and i eyes were burning like have been swimming all day.When i got home the video we tried to get just had a glance of a lighted object for a few seconds and it disappeared. i felt anxious not scared. it's hard to explain this experience since i've never really believed in ufos until now. i know what i saw was not from this world. it was huge, no sound and to fast for anything i've ever seen or heard of in this country. truly amazing for me and my daughter both.
content.summary: 2 encounters within 1 hour 52 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
On 1/20/16 at approximately 7pm mst, i was a passenger in a car driving on i-80 towards the salt lake city airport. i witnessed four white lights hovering in the air. there was a red light in the middle of the four white lights. at first i thought that maybe it was a helicopter or an airplane holding for landing (as we were about 2 miles away from the airport), but the strange thing was the lights were at different elevations. they were diagonal from each other and all were perfectly still. then two of the white lights went out. the other ones went out, then the same two that first went out came back on. they proceeded to almost "blink" at each other, and appeared to get brighter and dimmer. at one point all the lights went out, then came back on. 

i lost track of the object as we exited the highway, but watched it for a good 2-3 minutes. the whole time the object/objects were in sight, it remained stationary in the sky.
content.summary: Trio of white lights/one red light hovering on 80

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife, my 2 nieces and 2 daughters were sitting in the car waiting on my sisters to come out this house from getting one of their hair done, i looked south in the sky about 3 blocks down and saw a round white light rising from the trees, i knew it was something out of the ordinary, the light blinking on and off slowly, after rising above the trees it started to move straight towards us moving very slowly quietly, light still blinking slowly, it flew over the car slowly it was a black triangular shape object with just that one light. i wanted to jump out of the car and get a better look until my wife grabbed my arm and told me not too, it flew until we couldn't see it anymore
content.summary: It look like it may have landed , and took off slowly towards us, moving very slowly and quite with a white blinking light

content.detailedDescription:
Did not know about this craft until i got home and reviewed footage, a few days later. i did have a night time sighting that night go and see report i filed on january 05, 2016 mufon sighting report (73673)
i was standing by my car on pearl st turner,maine facing upper st on cross road.I would like to thank my 2 friends in the uk for there help with photo!
content.summary: Did not know about this until i got home and looked at picture

content.detailedDescription:
Translate from german

ich habe das flugzeug gesehen und sah etwas neben dem flugzeug ich hatte gerade eben meine kamera bei mir und schoss das bild danach hab ich gesehen wie das objekt 6 mal so schnell wie das flugzeug richtung meer veschunden ist. das war so schnell. das war ein super erlebnis in meinen ferien.

liebe grüsse anthony
content.summary: Ufo neben flugzeug

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bathroom talking to wife and had this energy come over me and my inner voice said, "go outside" twice, then i heard "west"... immediately grabbed my wife and went outside, thought we were taking pics of a bright star, then it glided up, turned (seemed to wink at me) then sat then floated away !!! it was amazing for me, scared my wife!
content.summary: Star, triangle 3 white dots with red in middle, pulsing subsonic vibration... seemed to morph

content.detailedDescription: On january 16, early in the morning at between 5 am - 5:15 am, i had been up most of the night due to high winds, thunderstorms and a tornado warning in the area.  the storm had just pasted our area and i went out to the lanai to check out any damage in yard when i happened to notice two very bright lights just west of my house at tree top level.  they were moving apart from one another and then moved together.  at first i thought they were maybe the coast guard looking for a ship or something.  then all of a sudden these two lights started shooting out what looked like three projectiles which looked like red cords with white large balls on the ends of the red cords which were attached to the lights and then released towards the ground or into the water as i could not tell if they were over the gulf or near shore.  as i watched in shock of what i had just witnessed they continued to do this 3 more times, about three projectiles at once.  i then ran and grabed my phone as it was the closest video recorder i could find and videoed these two lights for another 18 minutes or so.  the lights continued to hover and move towards each other and apart.   i then ran  inside to wake up my husband and they were gone by that time.
content.summary: Two hovering bright lights, shooting apprx 10 projectiles near beach, after tornados/damages venice fl

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling south on hiway 61 south from memphis heading to tunica casinos about 10:45-11:15am on01/19/2016 when i saw it above a group of tress to my front left side, at first i thought that someone was flying a delta type kite,we drove a little farther down the hiway, then i noticed that it was way bigger than a kite, might it be a wierd blimp of sorts or could it be a test craft of our armed forces.
i don't know, it seemed to be real big about two football fields in length and hovering about 500 ft. abouve a grove of trees over to my left about 1000+ feet away.I was driving so i had to pay attention to the hwy speed that is posted at 60.I observed the craft for approximate 3-4 minutes before we passed it on my left side and could not see it anymore because of driving. i thought about pulling over but about the time i was going to someone in a late model minivan/suv brown in color had thier hazzerd lights on and was pulled over to the sholder of the hwy. thought that they might be watching it so we kept on going then a mile past the minivan suv we saw a black tahoe suv with blue lights flashing pointing to the north sitting in the grassy area between the northbound and southbound lanes of hwy 61 like he was observing the craft also.
the craft was huge cheveron/wing shape dark gray just a little darker than the cloud base above it just hovering above the tress,did not see any details or lights,did not make any noise or mess with the vehicals electrical system and such,  i just thought it was a little odd and that other people saw it would report it, like the people in the minivan and the blacked out(police)tahoe.
the weather at the time approx.10:45-11:15am was 28*f overcast visabilty 10 mi. wind east@ 8mi. 43% humitiy bar.1033.1 millibars date 01/19/2019
approx. location lat. 34* 56'28.74*n  long. 90* 7"50.96*w
content.summary: Spotted above trees left side of hwy 61 south kinda looked like a chevron/wing pointing north just hovering above a cluster trees

content.detailedDescription: I was at my girlfriend's house, laying bed with her. i happened to glance up and saw the being. my girlfriend had told nme she has many encounters with aliens before but i didn't believe her until i saw the being. i knew instantly the being was what my girlfriend had been talking about. it matched the drawings. the being walked towards my girlfriend and gently placed a hand on her head but didn't hurt her. it watched her open her eyes then left soon after. i was terrified when i saw it and when it touched my girlfriend i held her even tighter, i was afraid it was gonna take her. i lost sight of the being when it seemed to phase through the wall and a streak of light shot upwards.
content.summary: It was like i was in a horror movie but nothing hurt me

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside onto the front porch at around 10:20 a.M. to smoke tobacco and i and another man, a housemate of mine here at the retirement home named joe stahovic witnessed lights above the eastern horizon and sounds that were at the time of the lights.  

the lights were green, orange maybe, and blue i believe, and they took up i suppose around 40 degrees of the whole horizon circumference, i estimate 600 or 700 feet, and high into the air... about 30 feet above the horizon which is a small ridge in the eastern direction starting not far from where we live here where i am writing you from on lincoln street in bolivar.

i reported here a few months ago about seeing a lot of ufo activity in this area and i still see them.

i saw stan gordon on the local news last night talking about people in fayette county that have felt blasts and heard booms over their horizon, that's what got me thinking about what me and joe had seen.

i had e-mailed stan gordon in the past about orbs that i saw in december of 1999 at uparc (university of pittsburgh applied research center).

i think the lights and sounds were either a crashed ufo, a starport being set up, or just some kind of a landing.

later that day i was outside smoking once again and an old army truck drove past, the kind that carry troops but it didn't have the canopy in the back and only had a driver.  the driver beeped at me but while he was passing the next house down, and turned off of lincoln street.

there are fly-overs any time i am at the state hospital or in a placement like i am now in this retirement home.  i cannot even begin to describe it all and i don't know why they fly over.  

about 2 months ago there were 2 very large cargo planes that flew maybe 20 feet over the house and then over the ridge, and that same day they flew over my mother's house also.  she lives 20 minutes from here by car.
content.summary: Lights flashing and residual with sounds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my mothers house down fm 2001 into buda,tx and i looked up and seen a very bright redish orange glowing light in the sky, so i was very exited i hurried to my moms house beat on her door and ran out to her backyard and told her boyfriend to come look right when i got outside it was going down and my moms boyfriend barely seen it but then it shot back up in the sky very quikly and just hovered and then i hear a helicopter coming from the other direction and the helicopter was flying right at it the object then moved into the clouds and the helicopter just kept going, when the helicopter was a good ways away the object then came out of the clouds and hovered there for a min and the light just dimmed a little and the object started throwing out these little lights it almost looked like glitter it looked very strange, this object went down to the ground and back up about four times. this incident was at 8:30pm and ended at 8:44 lasted about 10 to 15 minutes im sure people that were traveling down i35 into austin seen this it was very bright. i live pretty close to the airport so i see airplanes alot and i am very familiar with the different lights on a plane but this object did not look or move like a plane at all.
content.summary: Very bright red/orange light in the sky
